review: I just received my fire stick this week and I was so excited.  The setup was a piece of cake (even for someone who is not good with technical issues).  Anyway, I love the fact that I can watch shows and movies on the TV instead of my tablet - FABULOUS.  The reason for the low rating is that my fire stick keeps sticking.  When watching a show that would have had commercials, the picture will stop on one image while the sound continues on.  Last night was the worst so far.  I had to get up after EVERY ad and unplug the device from the TV and the power just to get it to "reboot" since there is no power button on the remote.  I hate to send it back so soon because I had to wait for it to come back in stock, but if this continues, that is exactly what I will do.  ****So glad I didn't send my fire stick back.  Hulu plus is the only thing that I have problems watching.  Everything else is perfect.  I'm changing my review to 5 stars.
